main event: An advisory panel meeting on the scientific use of balloons was held on 15 November 1965, discussing various agenda items including prior recommendations, ballooning requirements, and upcoming expeditions.
interesting points: The panel discussed actions on previous recommendations which included ballooning requirements, progress on the heavy load launch development program, and requests for balloon flight services from Dr. Delbouille from Belgium and Dr. Alvarez from the University of California., The meeting included discussions on maintaining ballooning services and addressing the specific needs of scientific researchers., Several agenda items highlighted collaborations with international scientists for various balloon experiments., The panel examined the annual report and reviewed facility activities for the current calendar year., Future balloon expeditions were suggested and planned for high-altitude scientific research.
